title: Visual Age Java Third Party Tools

story.text: VA Assist, by Instantiations ([http://www.instantiations.com www.instantiations.com]) is a [[Visual Age]] for Java enchancement add-on.  It enhances the VAJ IDE, providing drag-n-drop features, in-place renaming, better control over versioning and the repository.
Yes, its excellent. Try the free version (and remember to grab the PDF help too); configuration is under the usual Options window. --[[Channing Walton]]
